```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```



```{r}
get_store_link <- function(page = 1) {
  
  link <- read_html("https://store.steampowered.com/search/?ndl=1&ignore_preferences=1")
  
  game_link <- link %>% 
    html_elements(".search_result_row ds_collapse_flag  app_impression_tracked") %>%
    html_elements("a") %>% 
    html_attr("href")
  
  return(game_link)
}

get_store_link()
```
